title: Pangea Organics logo rounded tech sans
content:
If any body knows the main font in this image, or similar fonts?

Thanks in advance. :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002126im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/pangea-logo_3740.jpg)

 [‹ Heavy script on Tópas Icelandic candy packaging](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002126/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41981 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Wide sans caps in Fantastic Man magazine - Engravers Gothic {BJ} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002126/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41977 "Go to next forum topic")
author: beek

comments.content: I’m willing to bet they took [FF DIN Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002126/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_din_ot_light/?sample_text=PANGEA%20ORGANICS), rounded the corners, and extended the ’S’ ends. All the proportions match.
